oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sam Houston portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Sam Houston (1793-1863). Shoulder portrait of Houston. Houston has full beard and mustache. Photograph reproduction by owner Professor Hale Houston, of Washington and Lee University, Lexington, Virginia. From The Raven: A Biography of Sam Houston.

U.S. Congressman from Tennessee, 1823-1827. Governor of Tennessee, 1827-1829. President of the Republic of Texas, 1836, 1841-1844. U.S. Congressman from Texas, 1846-1859. Governor of Texas, 1859-1861.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houston, Sam, 1793-1863
Houston, Sam, 1793-1863;Tennessee. Governor;Texas. President (1841-1844 : Houston)
